title: Prepare for an IRS Office Audit
description: A taxpayer has been selected for an office audit regarding their Schedule C business expenses.

tasks.description: Review the IRS audit notice to identify the specific items under examination.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the audit is focused on travel and meal expenses.

tasks.description: Gather all relevant documentation from the taxpayer, such as receipts, mileage logs, and bank statements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a complete set of supporting documents.

tasks.description: Organize the documentation and prepare an audit file to present to the IRS agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a well-organized file that substantiates the expenses claimed.
